item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Possibly an undocumented server hotfix messed this.
I had done Shadow Labs a couple of times after the key piece nerf -- we killed the key shard elite before Murmur, the 2 people that needed could both loot it. Either you had a bugged instance or Blizz messed it up with hotfixes.
item.content:encoded:
Possibly an undocumented server hotfix messed this.

I had done Shadow Labs a couple of times after the key piece nerf — we killed the key shard elite before Murmur, the 2 people that needed could both loot it. Either you had a bugged instance or Blizz messed it up with hotfixes.

item.title: By: magin
item.dc:creator: magin
item.description: On 2/24 five man killed the shard carrying elemental prior to killing murmur. But only 1 person could loot the shard, when he did the shard was not lootable by others. This is why I was looking at this line of chat to see if it had changed to the first person only getting the key shard. We were all the original group that got to that point. Or is it possible that you now need to kill murmur first for all to loot and if you kill the shard first only 1 can. Don't know but this is what happened.
item.content:encoded:
On 2/24 five man killed the shard carrying elemental prior to killing murmur. But only 1 person could loot the shard, when he did the shard was not lootable by others. This is why I was looking at this line of chat to see if it had changed to the first person only getting the key shard. We were all the original group that got to that point.
Or is it possible that you now need to kill murmur first for all to loot and if you kill the shard first only 1 can. Don’t know but this is what happened.

item.title: By: simon
item.dc:creator: simon
item.description: new met online play waar op laptop opstart gaan nu spellen u dankt
item.content:encoded: new met online play waar op laptop opstart gaan nu spellen u dankt

item.title: By: Ghiest
item.dc:creator: Ghiest
item.description:
When someone bends down to pick up the key part, it spawns a lvl 71 elite now and when you kill him you can loot the key part. So you can still get 5 key parts if you clear to the the key shard then draft in the guildies that need it (rarely a full 5 man needs it) kill the elite loot shard then swap back over.
Was expecting more druid nerfs tbh, where is the warrior love?
item.content:encoded:
When someone bends down to pick up the key part, it spawns a lvl 71 elite now and when you kill him you can loot the key part. So you can still get 5 key parts if you clear to the the key shard then draft in the guildies that need it (rarely a full 5 man needs it) kill the elite loot shard then swap back over.

Was expecting more druid nerfs tbh, where is the warrior love?

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description:
That was meant with more humour than it sounds, it was early.
I now think I've read it wrong anyway... It just means you have to be part of the initial party right? I thought it was like the AQ opening... first party gets the only keys...
Like I said, it was early...
item.content:encoded:
That was meant with more humour than it sounds, it was early.

I now think I’ve read it wrong anyway… It just means you have to be part of the initial party right? I thought it was like the AQ opening… first party gets the only keys…

Like I said, it was early…

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Sorry Gemma. I blame the blog intern.
item.content:encoded: Sorry Gemma. I blame the blog intern.

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description: Well thats good to know.... now....

item.title: By: Staarkhand
item.dc:creator: Staarkhand
item.description: Part of getting keyed for Karazhan involves accessing quest items that are located within level 70 5-mans (Shadow Labs, Steamvaults, Arcatraz). Previously it was possible to beg a 5-man who had just cleared said instance to invite you to group, zone in, and run through the empty halls to collect your item.
item.content:encoded: Part of getting keyed for Karazhan involves accessing quest items that are located within level 70 5-mans (Shadow Labs, Steamvaults, Arcatraz). Previously it was possible to beg a 5-man who had just cleared said instance to invite you to group, zone in, and run through the empty halls to collect your item.

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: Can you clarify the Karazhan key thing for scrubs who aren't even close to that yet?
item.content:encoded: Can you clarify the Karazhan key thing for scrubs who aren’t even close to that yet?
